name: Gunshark
description:
Controls : Arrows to move, C to swim, V to shoot

You're a shark with guns. Guns that don't work underwater. Swim, jump and shoot !

New version!

- Added combo system
- Added bullet time
- Additional tweaks to hopefully improve the game. :)

Link to the pico-8 bbs entry : https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?uid=24687
